ygData.subject: Re: Freeport Quest Attempt
ygData.msgSnippet: Some info for you regarding Lady Shae.  I was outside the Freeport west gate waiting for someone, when she walked out the gate.  She was immediately killed by
ygData.messageBody:
Some info for you regarding Lady Shae. I was outside the Freeport west gate waiting for someone, when she walked out the gate. She was immediately killed by a Dark Elf (didn't check class) who was apparently waiting for her. I don't know if this is triggered or just a regular routine for her, but her little walk may cause her to carry different drop items.

Scragg Wraithbone of Bristlebane (22nd TSK)
